ch.nolix.util.bidirectionalController

Class NetBidirectionalController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.util.bidirectionalController.NetBidirectionalController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBidirectionalController, IController, IControlleroid, Stoppable

    public final class NetBidirectionalController
extends java.lang.Object
    A net duplex controller is a duplex controller on an other process on the same or on an other computer which can be reached through a net connection.
